colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES PA PAndI TA NOR BU GLING KYI 'JAM DBYANGS DGON PO'I SGRUB THABS 'DI YANG, MTHU STOBS NUS PA'I DBANG PHYUG SDE KHYI DON GYI YUL SKU DKON MCHOG LUNG  RIGS DANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DAM PA KHRI RIN DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA'I YUL GYI SKU 'JIGS MED RDO RJE'I SENG GE ,RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA 'JAM DBYANGS DKON MCHOG GIS BSKUL NGOR, DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
